TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintPreviewDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.Form

summary.span: 表示包含用于从 Windows 窗体应用程序中进行打印的 的对话框窗体。

span.span: Represents a dialog box form that contains a for printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在您创建类的实例时 ，某些读/写属性被设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 有关 Windows 窗体打印的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 设置 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 该示例假定窗体包含一个 包含对象的已命名 `TreeView1` 的 。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每个对象的属性 必须设置为可由运行该示例的计算机访问的完全限定的文档名称。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 将每个 属性设置为一个字符串，该字符串标识属性指定的文件 。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 例如，可以将设置 `TreeNode1.Tag` 为 "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" 和 `TreeNode1.Text` "recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 该示例还假定该窗体包含一个名为的和一个名为的 `PrintPreviewDialog1` 按钮 `Button1` 。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要运行此示例，请 `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序中调用方法。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAndPrintPreview/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例时 ， 属性将初始化为 `null` 。When you create an instance of , the property is initialized to `null`. 可以在运行时更改此属性的值。You can change the value for this property at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 设置 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 该示例假定窗体包含一个 包含对象的已命名 `TreeView1` 的 。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每个对象的属性 必须设置为可由运行该示例的计算机访问的完全限定的文档名称。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 将每个 属性设置为一个字符串，该字符串标识属性指定的文件 。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 例如，可以将设置 `TreeNode1.Tag` 为 "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" 和 `TreeNode1.Text` "recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 该示例还假定该窗体包含一个名为的和一个名为的 `PrintPreviewDialog1` 按钮 `Button1` 。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要运行此示例，请 `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序中调用方法。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler. summary.span: 获取或设置当用户按 Enter 键时所单击的窗体上的按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets the button on the form that is clicked when the user presses the ENTER key.

value.span: ，表示要用作窗体的“接受”按钮的按钮。

span.span: An that represents the button to use as the accept button for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 使用此属性可以指定用户在应用程序中按 ENTER 键时发生的默认操作。This property allows you to designate a default action that occurs when the user presses the ENTER key in your application. 分配给此属性的按钮必须是 当前窗体上的，或者位于当前窗体上的容器中。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 例如，您可以使用此属性，以允许用户在简单的窗体完成时按 ENTER 键，而不是使用鼠标手动单击 "接受" 按钮。You can use this property, for example, to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to press the ENTER key when they are finished instead of manually clicking the accept button with their mouse. 如果窗体上当前选定的控件截获 ENTER 键并对其进行处理，则可能不会激活 "接受" 按钮。The accept button might not be activated if the currently selected control on the form intercepts the ENTER key and processes it. 例如，如果选择此选项，则在控件中插入新的行字符时，多行文本框控件允许按 ENTER 键。For example, a multiline text box control allows the ENTER key to be pressed when it is selected to insert a new line character in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来允许您的窗体及其控件基于字体中的更改自动进行调整。You can use this property to allow your form and its controls to automatically adjust based on changes in the font. 这在应用程序中可能会很有用，其中，字体可能会根据指定用于 Windows 的语言而增加或减少。This can be useful in applications where the font might increase or decrease based on the language specified for use by Windows. 若要获取窗体将自动缩放到的大小，请使用 属性。To obtain the size the form will auto scale to, use the property. 如果要根据特定字体确定窗体将自动缩放到的大小，请使用 方法。If you want to determine the size the form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，窗体将接收所有 、 和 事件。When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all , , and events. 在窗体的事件处理程序处理完击键后，会将击键分配给具有焦点的控件。After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus. 您可以使用此属性来处理应用程序中的所有击键，并处理击键或调用相应的控件来处理击键。You can use this property to process all keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke. 例如，当应用程序使用函数键时，您可能希望在窗体级别处理击键，而不是为可能接收击键事件的每个控件都编写代码。For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗体没有可见或启用的控件，则它会自动接收所有键盘事件。If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 如果窗体是另一个窗体的子窗体，则子窗体不会显示在 Windows 任务栏中。If a form is a child of another form, the child form is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. 可以使用此属性来防止用户通过 Windows 任务栏选择窗体。You can use this property to prevent users from selecting your form through the Windows taskbar. 例如，如果您在应用程序中显示 " **查找和替换** " 工具窗口，则您可能希望阻止通过 Windows 任务栏选择该窗口，因为您需要同时显示应用程序的主窗口和 " **查找和替换** " 工具窗口才能适当地处理搜索。For example, if you display a **Find and Replace** tool window in your application, you might want to prevent that window from being selected through the Windows taskbar, since you would need both the application's main window and the **Find and Replace** tool window displayed in order to process searches appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 最顶层窗体是指与所有其他窗体重叠的窗体，即使它不是活动窗体或前景窗体。A topmost form is a form that overlaps all the other forms even if it is not the active or foreground form. 最顶层窗体始终显示在应用程序的 z 顺序的最高点上。Topmost forms are always displayed at the highest point in the z-order of an application. 可以使用此方法创建始终显示在应用程序中的窗体，如 " **查找和替换** " 工具窗口。You can use this method to create a form that is always displayed in your application, such as a **Find and Replace** tool window.

summary.span: 获取或设置将表示窗体透明区域的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color that will represent transparent areas of the form.

value.span: ，表示要在窗体上透明显示的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display transparently on the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与此类无关。This property is not relevant for this class. 为 属性赋值时 ，将以透明方式显示窗体中具有相同区域的区域 。When the property is assigned a , the areas of the form that have the same will be displayed transparently. 在窗体的透明区域上执行的任何鼠标动作（例如鼠标单击）都将被传输到透明区域下的窗口。Any mouse actions, such as the click of the mouse, that are performed on the transparent areas of the form will be transferred to the windows below the transparent area. 例如，如果将窗体的客户端区域设为透明，则单击该区域中的鼠标会将单击的事件通知发送到其下的任何窗口。For example, if the client region of a form is made transparent, clicking the mouse on that area will send the event notification of the click to any window that is below it. 如果分配给属性的颜色与 窗体上的任何控件相同，它们也将以透明方式显示。If the color assigned to the property is the same as any controls on the form, they also will be displayed transparently. 例如，如果 窗体上有一个控件的 属性设置为 ，则该控件将以透明方式显示，除非控件的 属性 更改为其他颜色。For example, if you have a control on a form that has its property set to , the control will be displayed transparently unless the property of the control is changed to a different color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现字体时，抗锯齿会删除锯齿状线条。Anti-aliasing removes jagged lines when fonts are rendered. 下面的代码示例演示如何 设置 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates the setting the and properties. 该示例假定窗体包含一个 包含对象的已命名 `TreeView1` 的 。The example assumes the form contains a named `TreeView1` that contains objects. 每个对象的属性 必须设置为可由运行该示例的计算机访问的完全限定的文档名称。The property of each object must be set to a fully qualified document name that can be accessed by the machine running the example. 将每个 属性设置为一个字符串，该字符串标识属性指定的文件 。Set each property to a string that identifies the file specified by the property. 例如，可以将设置 `TreeNode1.Tag` 为 "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" 和 `TreeNode1.Text` "recipe.doc"。For example, you could set `TreeNode1.Tag` to "c:\myDocuments\recipe.doc" and `TreeNode1.Text` to "recipe.doc". 该示例还假定该窗体包含一个名为的和一个名为的 `PrintPreviewDialog1` 按钮 `Button1` 。The example also assumes the form contains a named `PrintPreviewDialog1` and a button named `Button1`. 若要运行此示例，请 `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序中调用方法。To run this example, call the `InitializePrintPreviewDialog` method in the form's constructor or event handler.
